page.title: 18PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: The Red Lion,Middleton,and The Fox in Wilbarston provide hot meals and bar snacks as well as drink.The Fox,built in the 19th Century,is the 2nd.oldest building in Wilbarston.It is a focal point in the village providing a meeting place for the drama group and badminton club as well as having the usual pub. games.It has a small family room with a juke box and garden. The Red Lion,built in 1935 on the site of an earlier Red Lion,has a large grassy play area but no family room. They have darts,pool,skittles and domino teams. Both pubs have fruit machines and small car parks.Residents living close to the Red Lion are annoyed about overflow car parking outside their homes.
